news.title: From April 6, owners can self-certify property tax data in Gurugram civic body camps
news.para: On April 6, camps will be set up at South City-1 and Signature Global Solera in Sector 107, followed by Ardee City on April 7, Sunischit Apartment in Sector 54 on April 8, community center in Suncity and E-2071 in Palam Vihar on April 9, and RWA office in A block of Sushant Lok-2 on April 10.

news.title: RBI penalises LIC Housing Finance for violation of norms
news.para: RBI said that the penalty on LIC Housing Finance has been levied for non-compliance with certain provisions of the 'Non-Banking Financial Company - Housing Finance Company (Reserve Bank) Directions, 2021' issued by RBI.

news.title: Indiabulls Real Estate to raise Rs 3,911 crore through issuance of shares, warrants to investors
news.para: ​Global investment firm Blackstone will invest Rs 1,235 crore, while the Bengaluru-based Embassy Group will infuse Rs 1,160 crore.

news.title: Bombay HC grants bail to HDIL promoters in PMC bank fraud case
news.para: A single bench of Justice S M Modak granted the duo bail in the money laundering case lodged by the Enforcement Directorate (ED) as well as the predicate offence registered by the Mumbai police's Economic Offences Wing.

news.title: Home prices in UK fall by 0.1% in March
news.para: Halifax, part of Lloyds Banking Group, Britain's largest mortgage lender, said the drop was not entirely unexpected after price rises in the previous five months and continued high interest rates.

news.title: Canada's national housing agency predicts a slowndown in housing construction
news.para: Housing starts will fall to 224,485 units this year from 240,267 in 2023, the Canadian Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) forecast in its Housing Market Outlook document.

news.title: Mohali DM issues notices to authorities over buildings touching power lines
news.para: The officers have been asked to be present in the DC office in person on April 5 with their replies. The notices have been issued seeking explanation for not initiating proceedings under section 133 of the CrPC against the officers.

news.title: CREDAI urges Rajasthan government to relook at circle rate hike
news.para: Speaking at the Confederation of Real Estate Developers' Association of India (CREDAI) Rajasthan’s four-day property expo that began on Thursday.

news.title: RBI holds repo rate at 6.5% for seventh consecutive time
news.para: While unveiling the first bi-monthly monetary policy for the current financial year, RBI has retained its growth and inflation forecast for the current fiscal at 7 per cent and 4.5 per cent respectively.

news.title: Four people booked for illegal sand mining in Trichy
news.para: Police investigated two cases of illegal sand mining, charging four individuals. Tipper truck with sand near Lalgudi bus stop and mini-truck near Keelamullaikudi church were seized. U Gomathi Priya faces charges.

news.title: Dehradun civic body collects property tax worth Rs 57 crore in FY24
news.para: Dharmesh Panauli, tax superintendent, said, “Our revenue was Rs 5 crore more than last year and almost 30% of it was through online channels.

news.title: Macrotech Developers achieves pre-sales of Rs 42.3 billion in Q4 FY24
news.para: During FY24, Macrotech Developers added new projects having cumulative gross development value (GDV) of Rs 203 billion in Mumbai Metropolitan Region (MMR), Pune and Bengaluru, exceeding its guidance of Rs 175 billion.

news.title: Puravankara achieved sales value of Rs 5,914 crore in FY24
news.para: Puravankara's quarterly sales value stood at Rs 1,947 crore for Q4 FY24, up by 93 per cent as against Rs 1,007 crore in Q4FY23.

news.title: Madras HC directs state government to submit report on unauthorized urban constructions
news.para: The court was hearing a plea pertaining to an unauthorised construction in Trichy district. During the course of hearing, the state submitted that a GO dated Mar 1, 2024.

news.title: Ferns Estates buys hotel in Goa for Rs 175 crore
news.para: Bengaluru's Ferns Estates has acquired a luxury hotel in Goa with plans to develop additional suites, aiming to capitalize on the high demand for such accommodations.

news.title: Ricardo Constructions raises Rs 505 crore debt from Asia Pragati
news.para: Ricardo Constructions, a wholly-owned company of the SP Group engaged in the construction of residential apartments, raised the bonds from Asia Pragati Strategic Investment Fund, managed by PAG, a global alternative investment firm.

news.title: NGT issues notices to Uttar Pradesh government, authorities over illegal construction on farmland
news.para: The NGT notice came in response to a petition filed by a former BJP councillor from Ghaziabad alleging the large-scale unauthorised construction of villas, townships, colonies, shops, houses, etc across the district.

news.title: Prestige Group acquires 21 acres land in Bengaluru for Rs 450 crore
news.para: The acquired land will be planned for residential development spanning approximately four million sq ft of developable area, comprising around 1,800 apartments.

news.title: Property sales in Hong Kong rise by 57.2% in March
news.para: Property sales in Hong Kong rose 57.2 per cent in March from the previous month, a clear sign that the market was largely buoyed by the government's lifting of all property cooling measures in its 2024-2025 Budget.

news.title: France’s Kering buys building worth $1.4 billion in via Montneapoleone
news.para: The building, which already hosts Saint Laurent's store, is developed over five floors. It includes more than 5,000 square meters of retail space, making it one of the largest properties in via Montenapoleone, according to the statement.
